alert.note: Alert for Interior Cumberland Highlands; Southern Franklin; Southern Oxford; Southern Somerset (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued December 22 at 3:27AM EST until December 24 at 2:00AM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY MORNING THROUGH LATE FRIDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...South winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 55 mph possible. * WHERE...Portions of south central and western Maine. Portions of central, northern, and southern New Hampshire. * WHEN...From Friday morning through late Friday night. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds. This includes outdoor holiday decorations.

area.areaDesc: Interior Cumberland Highlands; Southern Franklin; Southern Oxford; Southern Somerset
